Burrata = heavenly. Honey pork ribs = best I ever had. Mushroom/sausage cannelloni = drooling just thinking about it. Pan con tomate = warm, lightly oiled, perfectly toasted. Cava sangria was also great, just didn't deliver the buzz I was hoping for. If you're looking for a more upscale alternative to the pre-made "bar tapas," this is your place.
